function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of bias in the selection and evaluation of studies due to the involvement of multiple evaluators","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased conclusions drawn from the systematic review","Mitigation":"Standardize evaluation criteria and provide training to evaluators to ensure consistency and minimize bias","Technologies":"Standardized data extraction forms, critical appraisal tools, and pilot testing","People":"Researchers, evaluators","Owner":"Research team, project lead"},{"Description":"Incomplete or inadequate reporting of study characteristics and results","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the quality and relevance of the selected studies","Mitigation":"Develop standardized data extraction form, ensure comprehensive reporting of study details","Technologies":"Standardized data extraction forms, reporting guidelines","People":"Researchers, evaluators","Owner":"Research team, project lead"},{"Description":"Inconsistencies in the application of inclusion criteria for study selection","Impact":"Inclusion of studies that do not meet the predefined criteria, affecting the validity of the systematic review","Mitigation":"Conduct pilot testing, establish clear and specific inclusion criteria","Technologies":"Pilot testing, inclusion criteria guidelines","People":"Researchers, evaluators","Owner":"Research team, project lead"}]}
